Name New Layer + O⁢(⋅)𝑂⋅O(\cdot)italic_O ( ⋅ ) + #

Base+n n×n\timesitalic_n × Base 7⁢n⁢(d+d2)7𝑛𝑑superscript𝑑27n\ (d+d^{2})7 italic_n ( italic_d + italic_d start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) 25.1925.1925.1925.19M

DWAtt DWAtt L⁢d2+d2+L⁢d𝐿superscript𝑑2superscript𝑑2𝐿𝑑Ld^{2}+d^{2}+Lditalic_L italic_d start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_d start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_L italic_d 26.3826.3826.3826.38M
S4.T2.8.caption:
Table 2: The size and count of parameters of new layers in different configurations. Counts are of models building on RoBERTa24.
Base+n (deeper baseline) is chosen to be close in size to DWAtt and Concat.
For example, for base models with 12 layers, only n=1 layers are added; n=2 for 24 layer models. L𝐿Litalic_L refers to the depth of the base model, while d𝑑ditalic_d refers to the model width.
